token.label: Token
token.help: Your bot token from the discord developers portal

botName.label: Name of the bot
botName.help: Set a name for the bot on adapter start. Leave empty to keep current bot name.

dynamicServerUpdates.label: Dynamic server updates
dynamicServerUpdates.help: Watch for server, channel and user updates and update objects according. If disabled, the objects will only be updated on adapter start.

observeUserPresence.label: Observe user presence
observeUserPresence.help: Observe presence status for all known users.

processAllMessagesInServerChannel.label: Process all messages in server channels
processAllMessagesInServerChannel.help: If checked, all messages in server channels will be processed by the adapter. Otherwise only mentions and commands will be processed.

reactOnMentions.label: React on mentions
reactOnMentions.help: Let the adapter react on bot mentions.

reactOnMentionsEmoji.label: React with emoji
reactOnMentionsEmoji.help: Emoji to react with on mentions. Default is üëç.

text2commandInstance.label: text2command instance
text2commandInstance.help: Send messages from states with enabled text2command to the given text2command instance.

_text2commandInstanceHelp.text: Adapter needs to be running to be able to select a text2command instance!

text2commandRespondWith.label: Response of text2command
text2commandRespondWith.help: How the response of text2command is send

enableAuthentication.label: Enable authentication
enableAuthentication.help: If checked, only authenticated users will be allowed to interact with the bot.

confirm.title: Warning
confirm.text: When authentication is disabled, any user is able to interact with the bot! You should only disable authentication if you trust all users on any server where the bot is on. Do you really want to disable authentication?

_authenticatedUsersInstanceHelp.text: Adapter instance needs to be running to be able to select allowed users from a drop down list! Otherwise you need to enter the user IDs manually.

authenticatedUsers.label: Allowed users
authenticatedUsers.help: List of users allowed to interact with the bot.
